title: Dai Viet Su Ky

introduce.title: Character Introduction
introduce.paragraphOne: A talented general with the motto 'Defeat the enemy, report gratitude to the emperor.' This young general possesses a love for the country, courage, and strong determination.
introduce.paragraphTwo: Tran Quoc Toan, known for the famous legend of squeezing an orange at the Binh Than Conference, where he was not allowed to discuss military matters due to his young age. Undeterred, Tran Quoc Toan gathered soldiers, trained his troops, and led a rebellion against foreign invaders.
introduce.paragraphThree: With his strong determination, he was conferred the title of Hau Van Vuong and merged his forces to participate in the rebellion.

character.introduce: Known as the 'Northern Guardian Grand Commander,' Tran Hung Dao is a military genius and a virtuous and accomplished political figure.
character.content1: - He is renowned for his extensive knowledge and eloquence, excelling in both literature and a deep understanding of military strategy. Proficient in horse riding and archery, he is a master of the art of warfare.
character.content2: - Three times, he led the army to defeat the Mongol invaders, thwarting their attempts to invade our country.
character.content3: - In addition to his outstanding military prowess, Tran Quoc Tuan is also an exemplary figure of loyalty and wisdom. He knows how to set aside personal grievances to unite all nobles and generals in the court to serve the king and help the nation defeat its enemies.

rewards.title: Rewards

introduce.title: Introduction to the Game
introduce.paragraphOne: The Complete Annals of Dai Viet is the oldest surviving official history of Vietnam, a priceless heritage of the Vietnamese culture that has endured to this day.
introduce.paragraphTwo: With a mission to bring history closer to the youth of Vietnam in a genuine, intimate, and fresh way, the Vietsmile team released the historical game titled Dai Viet Su Ky in February 2024. Dai Viet Su Ky allows players to embody the heroic generals of Đại Việt. Gamers must apply intelligence, strategic acumen, and refined skills to directly build their empire, expand the Vietnamese territory, govern the nation, ensure the well-being and happiness of the people, and engage in direct battles against foreign invaders.
introduce.paragraphThree: Especially tailored for the historical games genre in Vietnam, the production team has designed distinctive cultural elements, such as stilt houses, conical hats, bamboo flutes, red-crowned cranes, traditional áo dài costumes, and the attire of ancient Vietnamese generals.

TranKhanhDu.introduce1: He is a master of both literary and martial arts, his swordsmanship likened to 'falling snow, blooming flowers', able to charge into a crowd of thousands as if entering an empty space.
TranKhanhDu.introduce2: Tran Khanh Du continued to play a significant role in the subsequent two battles against the Yuan army, particularly in defeating their naval forces carrying provisions, under the command of Truong Van Ho in December 1287. This pivotal moment shifted the tide of the war, leading to eventual victory and driving the Yuan Mongol invaders completely out of Dai Viet's borders by 1288.
TranKhanhDu.introduce3: In May 1312, he also accompanied King Tran Anh Tong in a campaign against Chiem Thanh, capturing even the Chiem Thanh prince, Che Chi, and bringing him back to the country.

PhamNguLao.introduce1: He is renowned for his intelligence, being a supremely talented individual in both literary and martial arts, with great ambition and high moral integrity.
PhamNguLao.introduce2: Despite being of common birth, he rose to become the Supreme Commander of the Palace Guard, earning immense respect and honor, being likened to Hung Dao Vuong and enjoying special favor from the Tran dynasty court.
PhamNguLao.introduce3: The life and career of Pham Ngu Lao have become a great legend in the national history, a testament to the ideology and military art of the Tran era. His exceptional talents made him, though not of noble lineage, highly esteemed by the Tran kings.

CongChuaAnTu.introduce1: For the nation, for the people, Princess An Tu, though very young, forsake the luxurious life within the palace, sacrificing herself to shoulder the destiny of the nation.
CongChuaAnTu.introduce2: An Tu entered battle alone, without a single piece of armor. She understood the peril the nation faced, with no other choice available, the princess embraced hardship, humiliation, and death to exchange for peace for the homeland.

3dPage.title: We're defending our fatherland
3dPage.clickAnywhereToEnableSound: Click anywhere to enable the sound

text1.content: Delve into the annals of time, where you'll forge civilizations, navigate political intrigue, and lead armies in epic battles that shape the course of history. Unravel the mysteries of the past as you embark on a quest for power and legacy in this immersive empire-building saga.

text2.content: Embark on an adventure through legendary tales of history, from constructing mighty fortresses to battling formidable foes, in an exhilarating and meaningful journey. Experience the thrill of domination and empire-building across historical epochs.
